message: The SDG_TARGET field for indicator 6-5-1, translated into all languages

data.en: 6.5 By 2030, implement integrated water resources management at all levels, including via cross-border cooperation, as appropriate
data.pt: 6.5 Até 2030, implementar a gestão integrada dos recursos hídricos em todos os níveis, inclusive via cooperação transfronteiriça, conforme apropriado
